attributes.action: Parliament to debate the immediate deportation of Qatada and other preachers of hate
attributes.additional_details: The British government should show some moral courage and make a political decision to deport Qatada, his entire family and any other preachers of hate from British shores in total disregard of the Human Rights Act and any European Court decisions. The British taxpayer should not be asked to support financially or in any way the behaviour of preachers of hate! Let them find succour among their brethren anywhere but in these islands!
